result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: 1:05 PM Prosecuting attorney Amy R. Greenwood Pautzke in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Christopher L. Mueller in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael Scholke in court for Christopher L. Mueller. Defendant understands charges listed in the Information and enters pleas of NOT GUILTY. Atty Scholke requests PTC. Defendant ordered to appear at next hrg. Present bond cont'd.

1:01 PM Prosecuting attorney Amy R. Greenwood Pautzke in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Christopher L. Mueller in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael Scholke in court for Christopher L. Mueller. Defendant aware of charges and waives formal reading. PQW received/reviewed by the Court w/ the defendant. Court finds defendant's waiver to be made freely and voluntarily and accepts the waiver. Court further finds probable cause a felony has been committed and defendant is bound over to circuit court. Court proceeds w/ ARGN.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference on November 17, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing and Arraignment on September 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Phone call from Atty Scholke and Jordan/DA's office scheduled WOPH and ARGN 9/28/2022 at 1pm, the CIA that was set on 9/15/2022 at 1pm has been canceled.
from Atty Scholke requesting new court date

1:36 PM Prosecuting attorney Lawrence James Lasee in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Christopher L. Mueller in court, in custody. Court makes stmt. SPD will appoint and are still looking for counsel. Defendant ordered to appear at next hearing. Present bond cont'd.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 11, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

1:32 PM Prosecuting attorney Lawrence James Lasee in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Christopher L. Mueller in court, in custody. Court makes stmt. Defendant request counsel and has provided SPD office w/ paperwork. SPD will represent but have a conflict and will look for counsel for defendant. Defendant ordered to appear at next hrg. Present bond cont'd.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Christopher L. Mueller
Current: 1111 Superior Ave Apt A, Oconto, WI 54153   (Effective: 06-21-2022)
Prior: 1111 Superior Av; Apt #A, Oconto, WI 54153

Covers both 22CF121 & 22CF122. Defendant shall maintain absolute sobriety. Defendant shall not possess/consume alcoholic beverages. Defendant shall not possess/consume any illegal drugs, drug paraphernalia/controlled substances without a valid prescription. Defendant shall not have direct or indirect contact w/ Nicholas Amory. Defendant shall immediately report to the Sheriff's Department for fingerprinting and photographing.

1:31 PM Defendant Christopher L. Mueller appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Edward Daniel Burke Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Spansail for SPD appeared by video. Def given complaint, advised of charges, and advised of right to counsel/SPD.  Bond is set.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
